'''''amlug''''' is a noun meaning "[[Dragons|dragon]]" in [[Noldorin]].<ref name=Ety349>{{LR|Etymologies}}, pp. 349, 370</ref>
==Etymology==
It is derived from the [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]] [[ANGWA|ANGWA/ANGU]] and [[LOK]].<ref name=Ety349/>
==See also==
*[[Sindarin]]/[[Noldorin]] ''[[lhûg]]''
==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[ango]]''
